text:
Hey everyone!
I happened to come across this Julia Project idea: Geostatistical clustering methods for GeoStats.jl and I'd love to be a part of this. Apart from reading the papers mentioned, how do I get started?

elements.text:
Hey everyone!
I happened to come across this Julia Project idea: Geostatistical clustering methods for GeoStats.jl and I'd love to be a part of this. Apart from reading the papers mentioned, how do I get started?

text: <@UA3UH56HL> seems like the best person to answer this (more active on Zulip)

elements.text: seems like the best person to answer this (more active on Zulip)

text: Thanks for pinging Kyle! Yes Zulip is best

elements.text: Thanks for pinging Kyle! Yes Zulip is best

text: Please ask in the <#CUQPPFC07|geostats>.jl stream or in private there
Slack is a black hole where all the conversation is erased

elements.text: Slack is a black hole where all the conversation is erased

text: <@U01M2M35BFW> please reach out on Zulip if you want to discuss this project idea further. I am going offline for today but will check it over the weekend, probably Sunday.

elements.text: please reach out on Zulip if you want to discuss this project idea further. I am going offline for today but will check it over the weekend, probably Sunday.

text:
Thank you for replying! I am unfamiliar with Zulip, how do I reach out to you there? <@UA3UH56HL>
A google search didn't really yield much :sweat_smile:

elements.text: Thank you for replying! I am unfamiliar with Zulip, how do I reach out to you there?
A google search didn't really yield much

text: Also, <#CUQPPFC07|geostats> is archived so I can't send new messages there :disappointed:

elements.text: is archived so I can't send new messages there

text: Check the Julia website the community tab

text: There you can find the link to login

text: Thank you, going through it now!
